definition: to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The latest de-listing has increasedspeculation that China's holdings will be adjusted down.
sentences.chinese: 最新的退市增加了中国会下调其所持债券的猜测。

sentences.english: In communicating the level of alarm, authorities need to be able to move down as well as up.
sentences.chinese: 在通报警戒级别时，各方当局需能做出上下调整。

sentences.english: The agency also slashed Portugals sovereign debt by two notches.
sentences.chinese: 标准普尔还将葡萄牙的主权债务等级下调了两个级别。

sentences.english: Black Arrow now costs 35 Focus, down from 45 Focus.
sentences.chinese: 黑箭现在消耗35集中，从45集中下调。

sentences.english: Svenska Handelsbanken Capital Markets cut its profitability target for the world’s biggest maker of mobile networks.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典商业银行资本市场下调了爱立信的利润预期。

sentences.english: The Swiss hearing-aid maker was cut to “neutral” from “buy” at UBS AG.
sentences.chinese: 瑞银集团把该公司股票评级从买入下调为中性。

sentences.english: Not all the lowered stock-market expectations are predicated on weaker earnings.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有的股市预期下调都是关于下调收益的。

sentences.english: Not all the lowered stock-market expectations are predicated on weaker earnings.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有的股市预期下调都是关于下调收益的。

sentences.english: In addition, development of diabetes in the hyperlipidemic state further down-regulates the connexins.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在高脂血症时糖尿病的发生进一步下调连接素。

sentences.english: He did say that further Refi-rate cuts were not to be discounted.
sentences.chinese: 他还表示，欧洲央行或将进一步下调再融资利率水平。

sentences.english: The cut marks the second half-point reduction this month.
sentences.chinese: 这是本月第二次下调50个基点利率。

sentences.english: Internal tray can be adjusted freely up and down according to requirement of customer.
sentences.chinese: 内部托盘可根据用户要求自由上下调整。

sentences.english: Interbank lending rates have come down and stabilized, but banks are not yet lending.
sentences.chinese: 同业拆借利率已经下调和稳定，但银行尚未放款。

sentences.english: Tongxiang, polyester POY yarn of high prices have slightly downward.
sentences.chinese: 桐乡方面，偏高的涤丝POY丝价也有小幅下调。

sentences.english: Ratings downgrades of assets guaranteed by Spain’s central bank didn’t help either.
sentences.chinese: 下调西班牙中央银行担保资产的评级也无济于事。

sentences.english: And the recent lowering of bank reserve requirements is a godsend.
sentences.chinese: 最近银行存款准备金的下调也是一个好消息。
